name: Broken (itch)
description:
In the first installment of the Broken series we see how a group of young adults - in a time of despair - learn to survive in a world of disease. A virus sweeps across the UK leading the dead to rise under all circumstances. How did the outbreak begin, was it a mistake? Or something more? The world is now Broken, will it ever be fixed? How long before you shatter?

Story by Meeko Ambrosia

Chapter 1: April 25 2017

Chapter 2: May 9th 2017

Chapter 3: TBD

Chapter 4: TBD

Chapter 5: TBD
